creator: felipe.contreras@gmail.com
text:
Basically it's that.

Checking service.bat I saw this line

set PR_JVM=%JAVA_HOME%\jre\bin\server\jvm.dll

JDK 1.5.0 has a different folder for JRE

Leaving PR_JVM unset makes it work.

creator: mturk@apache.org
text:
This is already fixed in the CVS.
You can find the full CVS log at:
http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/jakarta-tomcat-catalina/catalina/src/bin/service.bat?r1=1.5.2.1&r2=1.5.2.2
So it will be fixed in the next TC release.

creator: felipe.contreras@gmail.com
text:
Hmm, I'm sorry in fact that fix was not necesary.

The problem was that my JAVA_HOME was not defined at the moment of Tomcat's 
installation.

JDK 1.5.0 does have JRE in a different folder, but also inside the JAVA_HOME, 
as a copy.
